html:
3.10.21  11:31 am   what is 'the trees (okay, alright)' about?

      i can almost surely guarantee it's about songwriting

3.10.21  10:35 am   Ever thought about answering all the questions with one word for a day? 

      no

3.10.21  10:32 am   when you can start planning live performances, what sort of venue do you want?

     medium

     and would you want to perform to big crowds or small crowds?

     medium

3.10.21  9:37 am   any tips for aspiring musicians who have abstract thoughts such as "crackers are nice"?

      this may not be what you want to hear, but, you're gonna want to go ahead and start making the music

3.10.21  8:47 am   what are the psychological effects of your music

      you'll have to try it and see

3.10.21  8:22 am   Does it take longer to animate 3D videos than 2D videos? If so, how much longer?

      it takes ME longer to do everything because i am an idiot

3.10.21  8:07 am   should i consider investing in existing?

      yes

3.10.21  5:54 am   3.8.21  11:05 am any good famous examples of the latter situation (wherein a person makes another person a person)?

      no, i'm not even sure that is ever necessary. i merely proposed that as a backup plan

3.10.21  4:20 am   what are your thoughts on thunder?

      it's the sound of lightning

3.10.21  1:38 am   In "take a video of the ceiling", did you intentionally point the camera the wrong way?

      no, that was the first take, and a genuine accident

3.10.21  12:40 am   Do you ever re-write music while you're producing? 

      extremely rarely. it can be very destructive to do that, so i only do it if i'm really really sure it's definitely not working the way it is

3.9.21  10:57 pm   where does the sun come from

      i'm wondering where it is now

3.9.21  10:12 pm   do you enjoy existing?

      it has its ups and downs

3.9.21  9:57 pm   When you make your music, do you focus on what other people would enjoy or what you enjoy? 

      what i would enjoy, because that is the most reliable way to guess what at least someone else might enjoy. if it's something i don't enjoy, then that would also be a reliable way to predict what someone else might also not enjoy

3.9.21  9:42 pm   Why did you leave in the tune of I might quit

      i did not. that tune has a very 'arrival' sort of feeling to it

3.9.21  9:36 pm   What is the name of the song that you have complete and are working on the video for rn?

      i can't tell you

3.9.21  9:00 pm   have you ever flown a bird or have been flown by a bird? 

      no, but that sounds like something i would do

3.9.21  8:32 pm   do you have a new video

      yes

3.9.21  8:28 pm   how did you learn the riff in singing? I really want to know how to do it but the tutorials on YouTube are very complicated.

      i think you just have to improvise every day for a while

3.9.21  8:06 pm   I can't find that one question. Where is it? Please tell me.

      here

3.9.21  8:03 pm   Are you ready for some content?

      yes

3.9.21  7:30 pm   would you consider writing in a weird time signature for the sake of it?

      no. wait.... for the sake of what

3.9.21  7:10 pm   have you ever intentionally subverted expectations in your songs?

     yes

     and to what degree do you value predictability in music?

     50%

3.9.21  6:44 pm   what is the significance of ball and stick

      they just look phenomenal in the frame together. any excuse to put those 2 together

3.9.21  4:45 pm   how are you so patient?

      was impatient first, to get that out of the way

3.9.21  4:39 pm   if you had infinite time and resources what would you make

      everything

3.9.21  3:48 pm   what inspired you to make music?

      music

3.9.21  2:58 pm   should default blender cubes be deleted?

     if you find yourself deleting it more than half the time, then you might want to think about changing your startup document to have no cube

      do they have feelings too

     it's 3 seconds of your feelings

3.9.21  1:24 pm   why is South America in the south, and why is North America in the north

      because you said

3.9.21  12:29 pm   i have 40gb of song ideas and a full length album thats 90% done. what level of suffering am i on

     i think 9 or 10

      cause boy id love to find out what the next level is like

     it's similar

3.9.21  12:05 pm   Has the sky always been blue?

      no

3.9.21  11:22 am   how have you stayed so productive during the pandemic? idk with me but ive been completely destroyed by the lockdown. I know before lockdown it was all meaningless already, all i was doing was school which i was good at but at the end of the day i didnt care about because i just really wanna make music for the rest of mt life, but now in lockdown, i still have online classes but the meaninglezsness somehow feels more intense? and now i have all the time in the world because ive always found school a bit easy and i can finish homework relatively fast, but i waste all of it because im either too lazy to make more music, or when i do make music, i don't particularly like it. I have been hoarding instrumentals in my folders and have released none of them to the world. should i release them even if im not sure anyone will like it? or if theyre not ready yet? plus i have no confidence in my own voice, and so even when ive tried to record my voice for hour s on end already, i still end up deleting it. how much time do u spend recording? ugh just i really cant get myself to work, and i have resorted to self hatred as a form of pushing myself, even if i know it doesnt work. any alternatives maybe? sorry for the rant it's so disorganized thanks for this parasocial relationship correspondence thingie

      you seem to be a writer. What might make everything feel more secure is to use writing to help sort out all your different thoughts, goals, and feelings

3.9.21  11:17 am   what do you think about the moon?

      a very good loyal companion

3.9.21  10:19 am   thoughts on life

      it has a mind of its own

3.9.21  9:41 am   I'm listening to At the Airport Terminal...at the airport terminal. It's pretty accurate, like color to my feelings. How do you do that?

      i've learned to do it based on my own feelings, which may be similar to yours sometimes

3.9.21  8:54 am   Do you think my writing would be more special if I spent less time on the words and more on the meaning behind them?

      have you tried putting the meaning in front

3.9.21  8:46 am   I wrote a short instrumental piece with no regard to music theory--I didn't even give it a set time signature--last week and sent it to a friend of mine, who really seemed to like it. at first, I thought that was just their way of being supportive, but I later sent it to someone  who actually knows music theory, and they also seemed to like it. I've tried writing pieces since then, and I've written a couple, but they're nowhere near the length and complexity of my first one, which wasn't very long or complex to begin with.
my question is this: do you ever fear that the latest song you wrote was just based on dumb luck and might be the last good one?

     no

     if so, how do you cope? if not, HOW?

     i've seen how rampantly contagious the forces of music are. over and over and over again, year after year after year after year after year (etc). It's like rainstorms. there's always another huge rainstorm. meteorologists have discovered this

     anyway, I hope your day's going well

3.9.21  8:41 am   what is something that amazes you?

      time

3.9.21  8:37 am   have you ever thought about making a reprise in one of your songs?

      yes

3.9.21  6:20 am   How do you write a chord for a part of a melody with lots of quick notes? Do you just put lots of notes in the chord? Do you just not have a chord at all? Or do you just accept that some of the notes won't be part of the chord?

      which of those have you tried so far, and which ones did you like

3.9.21  4:14 am   is paper a good name to name a dog

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.9.21  12:24 am   if you put a sheet of paper on a bed, does it become a bed sheet?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.8.21  10:04 pm   how do i get over my obsession with argentina

      you could go there, or if you can't go there then maybe you could write a pamphlet about it

3.8.21  9:30 pm   what is "Here comes the sun" about...

      the sun

3.8.21  8:45 pm   what is the best instrument at breakfast

      the relentless forward march of time

3.8.21  7:36 pm   can you elaborate on what you mean when you say "make a song bad at first"

      you would have to elaborate on the context of where you found that quote

3.8.21  7:01 pm   what are shoes supposed to do? bill this is my homework question. please answer.

      protect your feet from the ground, hypnotize foes, etc

3.8.21  6:44 pm   why are do many of your songs use the rhyme alright/just fine?

      due to goals, i suppose

3.8.21  5:32 pm   do you ever see yourself making a piano only music vid

      sure

3.8.21  4:43 pm   what question did damien maymdien skip in "maybe i could eat blades of grass?"

      this one
